thread.title: Very convenient to The Javitz Center and Penn Station
thread.title_full: Very convenient to The Javitz Center and Penn Station - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dmasdan
title: Very convenient to The Javitz Center and Penn Station
text: We stayed at this hotel because of its convenience to The Javitz Center. My daughter was attending the IBS Show, so we wanted a hotel that was close to Penn Station and The Javitz. This hotel was quiet, clean . Short walk to Times Square and the Theatre district.
